name: yeetchat-docs
description: yeetchat docs; this only exists for "npm run" commands

scripts.test: echo "Starting mkdocs on port 8000" && python -m mkdocs serve
scripts.preinstall: echo "This package has no NPM libraries; but this command does install the mandatory pip library. Please ensure python 3.9 or above is installed."
scripts.postinstall: pip install mkdocs-material mkdocs-git-revision-date-localized-plugin pymdown-extensions pygments
scripts.build: move docs site && python -m mkdocs build && move site docs

author: 0j3 & celestialcrafter
